alert.note: Alert for Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:01PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Suwannee, northwestern Hamilton and western Echols Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Suwannee River State Park, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jennings, Statenville, Suwannee River State Park, Mayday, Dowling Park, Blue Springs and Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
